  • Von com.wegapplikation.config.controller verwendete Klassen in com.wegapplikation.config.controller
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Direction
    The Direction enum represents the four cardinal directions: UP, RIGHT, DOWN, and LEFT.
    GameState
    The GameState class represents the current state of the pathfinding or "Game" logic within the application.
  • Von com.wegapplikation.config.view verwendete Klassen in com.wegapplikation.config.controller
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    RouteCal
    The RouteCal class is a custom JPanel responsible for displaying the map, handling user interactions for route selection, rendering the pathfinding visualization, and executing the pathfinding logic (Breadth-First Search).
